data.name: Are you sure to clear exceptions

This Enterprise communication tool allows you send regular compaigns and surveys to your customers.
data.value: 这个企业交流工具能够让您有规律地群发邮件和问卷调查给您的客户

data.name: This is a trail version with the following limits
data.value: 这个版本为试用版，有如下的限制

data.name: Select email clients to preview
data.value: 选择邮件客户端以便预览邮件在这些邮件客户端中的效果

data.name:
The SpamAssassin checker will use many spam rules to check the mail content.
Each rule has a score which indicates the spam’s severity.
The system will respond with a [Total score]/[Threshold].
If the total score is greater than the threshold,
it is very possible your mail will be marked as spam.
data.value:
SpamAssasin使用许多垃圾邮件识别规则来检查邮件内容，
每个规则都会有一个分数指示垃圾程度，
系统将返回一个[总分/危险分]
如果总分大于危险分，您的邮件很有可能被识别为垃圾邮件

data.name: Preview all
data.value: 在所有的邮件客户端中预览

data.name: Are you sure you want to preview in all email clients
data.value: 确定要在所有的邮件客户端中预览本邮件?

data.name: Generating preview, please wait a moment
Are you sure you want to leave page? All your changes might be lost.
data.value: 如果你现在离开该页面，您所做的修改都将不会被保存。确定要离开当前页面?

data.name: View click report in email preview
data.value: 在邮件预览中查看点击统计数据

data.name: The header settings here will be the default header values for a new campaign.
data.value: 在创建营销邮件的时候，这些信息会被当做默认的邮件头部信息。当然，在创建营销邮件的时候，你可以更改默认的邮件头部信息

data.name: Are you sure you want to delete this item?

data.name: Create in details
data.value: 添加联系人及其个人信息

data.name: Are you sure you want to {0} these subscribers?

data.name: Delete the survey will delete the data belong to this survey, and so as to the reports.
data.value: 如删除该问卷，则所有和该问卷有关系的数据均会被删除，问卷报告数据也会被删除

to join this survey or copy the link url below to distribute it

data.name: Survey Joined
data.value: 您已参加过这个问卷调查

data.value: 您已参与过这个问卷调查。

data.name: Before join this survey, please enter your validation message first.
data.value: 回答本问卷前，请先填写验证信息。

data.value: 您输入的验证信息有误!

data.name: This survey has not been published yet.
Publishing your survey means it is ready to be taken.
data.value: 一旦发布了问卷，意味着该问卷可以被回答了

data.name: Please select the item you want to delete.
Are you sure you want to delete folder [ {0} ]? All files under this folder will be delete too.

The file you selected is not an image file.
data.value: 您所选择的不是一个图片文件

data.name: The file you select is not a image file.
data.value: 您所选择的不是一个图片文件

data.name: Browse for an image on your computer. Click Upload Image to add it to your Image Library.
data.value: 浏览图片并点击“上传图片”来添加您自己的图片

data.name: We could not find your DKIM DNS TXT record \"{0}\".
data.value: 无法找到您的DKIM DNS TXT记录 \"{0}\"

data.name: The value of DKIM DNS TXT record "{0}" is incorrect, please use the suggested DKIM DNS TXT Record value.
data.value: DKIM DNS TXT 记录 "{0}"不正确，请使用建议的 DKIM DNS TXT记录

data.name: We could not find your SenderID DNS TXT record \"{0}\".
data.value: 无法找到您的SenderID DNS TXT记录 \"{0}\"

data.value: SenderID DNS TXT记录"{0}"的值不正确，请使用以上建议的 DKIM DNS TXT记录

data.name: Input valid email address
data.value: 请输入有效的邮箱地址

data.name: Input valid email addresses in multiple lines
data.value: 请分行输入多个有效的邮件地址

data.name: Unrecognized Email Clients
data.value: 无法识别的邮件客户端

data.name: The name that your recipients will see
data.value: 显示在邮件中的发件人名称

data.name: Only send to subscribers in these selected list
data.value: 只把邮件发送给选中的分组中的联系人

data.name: Send emails to all contacts without additional controls.
data.value: 把邮件发送给所有联系人

data.name:
Send different messages to a controlled number of contacts (could be the whole group).
This is done to determine which message is more effective according to your parameters.
The best message will then be sent to the rest of contacts in the selected group.
data.value:
系统先发送A/B邮件至指定数量的测试联系人，
等待一段时间后根据最高阅读率或最高点击率等标准选出最佳邮件发送给剩余联系人

data.name: Customize your campaign by choosing from pre-designed templates and using editing tools.
data.value:
您可以通过使用预定义的模板和专为模板设计的可视化编辑器来个性化您的邮件。
这种方式有利于复用邮件的样式，提高工作效率

data.name: Have ultimate control by using rich text editor (WYSIWYG) and plain text editor.
data.value: 使用富文本编辑器编辑邮件

data.name: Send A and B mail to a specific number of subscribers and then select a best fit email based on the open rate or click rate during a specific period of time.
data.value: 系统先发送A/B邮件至指定数量的测试联系人，等待一段时间后，以最高阅读率或最高点击率为标准选出最佳邮件发送给剩余联系人

data.name: The period of time that waiting for test subscriber's opening and clicking mails.
data.value: 等待测试联系人阅读邮件的时间

data.name: The criterion to choose the best fit mail
data.value: 根据阅读率或者点击率为标准选择出最佳邮件

data.name: The spam check service is not running. Please start the spam service if you would like to do a spam check.
data.value: 垃圾邮件评测服务没有在运行，如果您想检测邮件被当成垃圾邮件的可能性，请开启垃圾邮件评测服务

data.name: The first line of the uploaded file contains only header information. This will not be used for data import.
data.value: 选中该复选框，则系统将会默认您上传的文件的第一行只包含了表头信息，这一行数据不会被导入

data.name: Dirty data action
data.value: 遇到脏数据时如何处理

data.name: Allows people not in the list subscribers to send emails to this list.
data.value: 允许转发来自非“转发到”联系人分组里联系人的邮件

data.name: Only messages that come from an email address that matches the filters here will be forwarded to the group. Use multiple lines for multiple values. Example: "abc.com" will forward all emails sent from *@abc.com
data.value: 只有发件人邮箱包含包含所填关键字的邮件才会被转发，如：您在这里填写了“abc.com”，那么只有发件人邮箱为“*@abc.com”的邮件才会被转发

data.name:
Subject line filter, same as "From email".
Example: "unsubscribe" will forward all emails that contain keyword "unsubscribe" in the subject
data.value: 只有主题包含所填关键字的邮件才会被转发

data.name: The POP server of the above email address
The language that will be used to encode your email message.
data.value: 选择您邮件内容的语言

data.name: Replacing the links in your campaigns with trackable links, so that you can see the click report.
data.value: 把邮件中的链接替换为可被跟踪的链接，那么您将可以在邮件报告中查看到点击记录

data.name: The system inserts a trackable link to the message to detect whether the recipient opened the mail.
data.value: 选中这个复选框，你可以跟踪到联系人是否阅读了您的邮件

data.name: Track the messages that failed to reach the target recipients and report the reason.
data.value: 选中这个复选框，系统将会跟踪退件并记录退件原因

data.name:
When the user opens the trackable link, the system will auto add a cookie.
The cookie can indicate which contact is visiting the page and which campaign lead to the page.
data.value:
当用户打开被跟踪的链接，系统将为跳转的链接添加一个cookie
在cookie中将体现出是谁打开了哪封邮件，这个机制有助于您跟踪转化率
但是此功能依赖于自定义域名和跟踪点击，而且要使cookie生效，请将自定义域名和跳转链接的域名设置为一致

data.name: The key name of your cookie that you can use to retrieve the value later.
This needs to match the domain value at the above "Base tracking URL". If left blank, system will auto detect domain from tracking URL.
data.value: 这需要与上面的“自定义域名”中域名值相匹配，如果放空，系统将会从跟踪链接中自动检测到域名

data.name: This is the domain you plan on using as the from address for each campaign you send for this client. If you're sending email from info@abc.com, then you should just enter abc.com.
data.value:
这个域名就是您发送营销邮件使用的发件人邮箱所在的域名
如果发件人邮箱为info@abc.com，这个域名应该填写abc.com

data.name: I've already set up DomainKeys for this domain
data.value: 我已经为这个域名设置好了DomainKeys

data.name: We could not find your DKIM DNS TXT record "{0}".
data.value: 无法找到您的DKIM DNS TXT记录 "{0}"

data.name: We could not find your SenderID DNS TXT record "{0}".
data.value: 无法找到您的DKIM DNS TXT记录 "{0}"

data.name: I have added these records, please verify them
data.value: 我已经添加完这些记录，请验证他们

data.name: If an email is sent out and fails to reach the target address, the message and an explanation for its failure will be returned to this address.
data.value: 如果邮件无法送达目标邮箱，会返回一个发送失败的通知邮件到这里指定的邮箱

data.name: If checked, user can access all menus.
data.value: 选中该项，用户可以使用所有的菜单

data.name: A test group is used to test your campaign before you send the real mail to mass subscribers.
data.value: 测试分组的作用是：在正式发送前，可以把邮件发送测试组以测试邮件是否会被正确送达收件箱

data.name: The URL which we will redirect users to after they subscribe via sign up form.
data.value: 联系人在注册表单上注册后被转向的链接

data.name:
Redirect URL for new subscribers after double opt in link confirmation.
Leave it blank to use system default
data.value: 联系人点击确认链接后的跳转的页面，如果此栏未被填写，系统将使用默认的跳转链接

data.name:
Redirect users to a URL after they unsubscribe.
Leave it blank to use system default.
data.value: 联系人退订后会跳转的链接，如果未填写此栏，系统将使用默认的跳转链接

data.name: Confirmation email must contain a confirm opt in link, please add <a subscription="confirm">your confirm text</a> tag to the content and set the double opt in redirect url in list edit page.
data.value: 确认邮件必须包含一个确认链接，请添加一个如下的标签<a subscription="confirm">确认文本</a>到邮件内容并在list编辑页面上添加一个供用户点击确认链接后跳转的url

data.name: aborted in row {0} column {1} for {2}
data.value: 由于{2}, 中止于第{0}行, 第{1}列

data.name: Enter the folder name and click create button to create sub folder.
data.value: 请输入文件夹名称并点击创建按钮来创建子文件夹

data.name: Set your personal web domain to be used in this application for login and open/click tracking. You need to point your DNS record to this server.
data.value: 邮件中的跟踪链接将使用此基础域名跟踪链接的点击，但是您要在的DNS设置中将此域名指向我们的服务器IP

data.name: Abort and report
data.value: 中止导入并报告错误位置

data.name: Are you sure you want to unsubscribe current licence
Invlid password token, please revisit forget password link in sign in page to get the email again.
data.value: 链接错误，请使用激活邮件中的链接地址

data.name: Please enter your username. We will send you an Email with a link to reset your password
data.value: 请输入用户名，我们将发送一封附带重置密码链接的确认邮件

data.name: Token not matched, please use the url send with the Activate email.
data.value: 链接错误，请使用激活邮件中的链接地址

data.name: User not found, please use the url send with the Activate email
data.value: 用户不存在，请使用激活邮件中的链接地址

data.name: User not found, please use the url send with the Reset Password email.
data.value: 用户不存在，请使用激活邮件中的链接地址

data.name: You have subscribe the above licence with
data.value: 您已以下支付方式订阅上述许可

data.name: You need to configure a correct bounce setting before adding a domain authentication
data.value: 您需要在管理员的邮件设置功能中先设置好退件设置

data.name: Import a local html or zip file.
data.value: 导入一个本地的html文件或压缩文件

data.name: Import html from a web page.
An email will be sent out to users after they unsubscribe.
data.value: 为退订的联系人发送通知邮件

data.name:
Generates an html form for users to subscribe to your newsletter.
The html form code can be adjusted and inserted into your existing web pages.
data.value:
生成一个注册表单，您可以把此注册表单放到您的网站上，以便您的用户填写信息并订阅邮件
当然，如果有需要，您可以进一步调整表单的html

data.name: Licence limit
data.value: 联系人许可数量的限制

data.name: Require a subscriber to confirm her opt in request via a link in the confirmation email
data.value: 通过发送确认邮件来保证注册联系人就是注册邮箱的拥有者，从而避免向随意填写的邮箱发送垃圾邮件

data.name:
Send welcome email to a new subscriber.
This is only valid when the user signs up via the sign up form generated above.
data.value: 用于给新注册的联系人发送欢迎邮件。但是只有当联系人通过这个联系人分组的注册表单注册的时候，他才会收到这个欢迎邮件

data.name: Can i use the list
data.value: 我是否能发送邮件给以下联系人

data.name: The persons will not receive a confirmation email. Since you're adding this recipient manually, they won't have an opt-in IP address or date in your records, so be extra sure you have permission first.
data.value: 由于是手动添加，联系人将不会收到确认邮件，不会有任何的确认记录，请确定添加的联系人同意接收您的邮件

data.name: Enter a message
data.value: 向您朋友转达的一句话

data.name: I want to forward this email to
You successfully forwarded the email to
data.value: 您已经成功将邮件转发给

data.name: Are you sure you want to delete this image?
Can not delete all attribute items.
data.value: 无法删除所有的投票问题

data.name: Can not delete all rating scale.
data.value: 无法删除所有的投票选项

data.name: Click on a color chip or enter a hex code value.
data.value: 选择一个颜色或输入十六进制值

data.name: Customize your form
data.value: 编辑问卷的字体和颜色

data.name: Enter the rating scale names in the boxes below. These names will become the column headings for your scale.
Input information about you or your organization here
data.value: 输入您或您的组织的相关信息

data.name: Input or options text
data.value: 输入框或选择框的文本

data.name: Input your website’s web address here
data.value: 请在这里输入一个网址，该网址将会成为“链接文字”的链接

data.name: Set how much each field is separated from the others
data.value: 设置问卷中每个问题之间的分隔符

data.name: Text inputted here will be hyperlinked to the URL inputted above
data.value: 这里输入的内容文字将作为上面输入的超链接的文字显示

data.name: Thank you for taking the time to complete our survey. We value your feedback.
data.value: 感谢您参与我们的问卷调查，我们非常重视您的反馈

data.name: Thank you for your participation in our survey. We value and appreciate your input.
data.value: 非常感谢参与我们的问卷调查，我们很重视您的反馈

data.name: The label that appears above all other text in this section.
The text placed in this area will appear for the survey taker to replace, Example: Answer here
data.value: 该问题的默认值。问卷回答者可以把这个值替换为他自己的答案

data.name: This is your form description. Click here to edit.
data.value: 表单描述，点击这里编辑

data.name: This text will be displayed to your users while they are filling out this section of the survey.
data.value: 这些文字将在受访者填写问卷的时候显示

data.name: Use the plus or minus icons to add or delete choices. Click on the star to make a choice the default selection.
data.value: 点击绿色加号图标新增选项；点击红色减号删除选项；点击黄色五角星图标可使该选项被默认选中

data.name: The image size is too big for this layout. Are you sure you want to use this size?
data.value: 图片过大，您确定要使用这个尺寸?

data.name: Are you sure you want to delete the link?
The image size is too large. This size may break the layout. Are you sure you want to set this size?
data.value: 图片过大，可能会破坏整体布局，确定要使用这个尺寸?

data.name: Survey title can not be empty!
Click the buttons on the right to add questions to your form.
data.value: 点击右侧的按钮添加问题

data.name: There is already a forminfo filed.
data.value: 您已经添加过表单信息字段了

data.name: There is already a thanks filed.
data.value: 您已经添加过感谢字段了

data.name: There is already a copyright filed.
data.value: 您已经添加过版权字段了

data.name: There is already a greeting field.
data.value: 您已经添加过问候字段了

data.name: Are you sure you want to reset the style!
Greeting section won't be displayed in this survey.
data.value: 此问候语将不会显示在调查问卷中

data.name: You have insufficient credits to send all mails of the campaign.
data.value: 余额不足，无法发送邮件给选中的所有的联系人

data.name: Are you sure you want to abort the campaign?
data.value: 确定要中止当前发送的营销邮件?

data.name: You have subscribe to the above licence with
data.value: 您通过以下付款方式订阅此许可

data.name: Your licence is inactive due to the inadquacy of your Palpal account. your account is in trial limitation currently.
data.value: 由于本月未付款，您的许可本月并未生效，现在处于试用状态

data.name: Are you sure you want to add the credits?
Are you sure you want to subscribe to the selected licence?
data.value: 确定要订阅选定的许可?

data.name: Are you sure you want to unsubscribe your current licence?
data.value: 确定要退订当前的许可?

data.name: Select one licence to subscribe to
Your licence is active for one month from {0} to {1}
data.value: 您当前的许可有效期为从{0}至{1}一个月的时间

data.name: Campaign is being sent or it has already been sent out. It cannot be canceled.
data.value: 该邮件正在或已被发送，无法取消

data.name: Are you sure you want to cancel the campaign schedule?
data.value: 确定要取消该邮件的定时发送么?

data.name: There must be an unsubscribe link in the email.
data.value: 邮件中必须包含退订链接

data.name: A name cannot contain a space or any of the following characters: \/:*?<>|~
data.value: 名称中不能包含以下字符: \/:*?<>|~

data.name: Are you sure you want to approve the campaign?
Are you sure you want to return the campaign?
Campaign has been returned to the user
Campaign has been submited, is wating to be approved
data.value: 该邮件已提交, 正等待审核

data.name: I promise I am not sending spam email
data.value: 我确定发送的不是垃圾邮件

data.name: This is the greeting message of the survey
data.value: 这是用户打开问卷时显示的问候语

data.name: There are some errors occur while creating mail
data.value: 创建邮件时遇到了某些错误

data.name: The selected lists contains no subscribers
data.value: 选择的列表中没有联系人

data.name: Please create DNS TXT Record of suggested name and value for DKIM support and verify it
data.value: 请以建议的名称和值为DKIM功能创建DNS TXT记录并验证

data.name: Please create DNS TXT Record of suggested name and value for Sender ID support and verify it
data.value: 请以建议的名称和值为Sender ID功能创建DNS TXT记录并验证

data.name: Your campaign is under improvement, click {0} for details
data.value: 请改进您的邮件，点击{0}查看详情

data.name: The selected list contains no subscribers
data.value: 选择的列表中没有联系人

data.name: click {0} to see how to improve your reputation
data.value: 点击{0}查看如何提高您的信誉

data.name: No data found in given data source, please reselect data source which contains data
data.value: 选择的数据源不包含可导入的数据，请选择有数据的数据源

data.name: Your campaign need to be approved for mass target subscribers and not high enough reputation
data.value: 由于您的信誉还未达到自由发送的阀值，而且联系人数量较多，我们需要审核您的邮件以确保邮件能被有效送达

data.name: Only {0} extension file is allowed
data.value: 只能上传以{0}为扩展名的文件

data.name: Some error occured when reading the data
Create default user to sign in
data.value: 创建初始的系统登录账户

data.name: Please unsubscribe current {0} licence before you select {1} licence
data.value: 选择{1}许可之前请先退订{0}许可

data.name: Are you sure you want to {0} the account?
Your accounts is limited to {0}, you can upgrade to higher licence.
data.value: 您当前许可最多允许{0}个账户，您可以升级许可以支持更多的账户

data.name: Your subscribers is limited to {0}, you can upgrade to higher licence.
data.value: 您当前许可最多允许{0}个联系人，您可以升级许可以支持更多的联系人

data.name: Upgrade licence or change licence plan
data.value: 升级许可或改变许可方式

data.name: Your accounts is limited to {0}, but you have currently {1} accounts, please remove {2} accounts before continue.
data.value: 您当前的许可最多允许{0}个账户，而您现在有{1}个账户，已超出限制，在发送邮件前请移除{2}个账户

data.name: Your subscribers is limited to {0}, but you have currently {1} subscribers, please remove {2} subscribers before continue.
data.value: 您当前的许可最多允许{0}个账户，而您现在有{1}个账户，已超出限制，在发送邮件前请移除{2}个账户

data.name: It is forbidden to delete this credit record in current situation.
data.value: 在当前状态下，此记录不能删除

data.name: Are you sure you want to delete the credit record ({0})?
data.value: 确定要删除此邮件点数记录({0})?

data.name: The email contains unsusbcribe link and online version link
data.value: 邮件中包含退订链接和在线链接

data.name: This person will not receive a confirmation email from {0}. Since you're adding this recipient manually, they won't have an opt-in IP address or date in your records, so be extra sure you have permission first.
data.value: 由于是手工添加，联系人不会收到确认信，系统也不会相应的确认记录，请保证联系人愿意接受您的邮件。

data.name: You can only import lists of people who sign up at your website. No 3rd party lists, no prospects, no lists that you scraped from websites, no chambers of commerce lists, etc.
data.value: 您只能导入在您网站上注册的联系人，不能是第三方提供的，或从网页抓取的，或是社区提供的列表。

data.name: Sorry, the campaign cannot be sent out since there are some errors in the HTML content of the Email. Please go back to re-edit the Email.
data.value: 您的邮件的HTML内容有错误，请检查并重新编辑您的邮件

data.name: For a better experience using this site, please upgrade to a modern web browser.
data.value: 您目前的浏览器版本在使用中有些页面可能无法正常显示，请升级到最高的浏览器版本。

data.name: You are using an outdated browser
Blocked
data.value: 邮件内容或发送服务器被屏蔽

data.name: Unable to connect
data.value: 域名不存在或无法连接服务器
